name: palisade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a strong fence made out of wooden or iron poles that is used to protect people or a place from being attacked
ChrisVanLennepPhoto/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages palisades [ plural ] US
a line of cliffs by the sea or a river
